name: Sriparna
greetingText: Ami Ayus, one of your friends üëã
wishText: I wish jano ebhabei sarajibon haste thakis, Dara akhoni close koris na aro kichu interesting ache ;)
text4: Eii bhabe toh sobai wish kore, I need to do something
outroText: Ami toke kono birthday gift dite parlam na takar obhabe, but dhore ne etai amar birthday gift ü§ç
replayText: Ebar ekhane teph, chol tor birthday celebrate kori eksathe ^_^
